amendment.description: To provide assistance for democracy programs in Russia.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2050 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2050 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR 10/31/2003 S13648-13649; text: CR 10/31/2003 S13649) To provide assistance for democracy programs in Russia.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2050 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Stevens.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2050 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
